CO

Chris O'Hara

VP, Marketing at SAP · Author · Data Strategist

LinkedIn → chrisohara.com →

I lead product marketing and solutions for SAP's Planning, Analytics, and Intelligent Applications within the BTP Data & Analytics Group. Before that, I spent five years running Salesforce Marketing Cloud's Data & Identity group. My career has been spent at the intersection of digital media, data management, and customer experience — from the early days of DMPs through the rise of CDPs and now into the era of AI-driven enterprise intelligence.

My writing explores the future of enterprise software and data — not just in marketing, but across the full stack from ERP to CRM. I'm interested in how data management, AI, and cloud platforms are reshaping the way businesses operate, plan, and connect with their customers.

My work has been published in AdExchanger, Econsultancy, The Future of Customer Engagement, and other industry publications. I've also written best practice guides on topics ranging from programmatic branding to the role of agencies in data management.

Books

Customer Data Platforms

Wiley, 2020 · with Martin Kihn

The first book on the CDP category — a deep dive into how companies capture, unify, activate, and analyze customer data to steer toward the future of personalization.

Data Driven

McGraw Hill, 2018 · with Tom Chavez & Vivek Vaidya

The indispensable guide to data-powered marketing from the team behind the data management platform that helps fuel Salesforce.

On the non-business side, I'm also the author of six books including Great American Beer, The Bloody Mary, Ribs, Hot Toddies, and Wing It! — covering topics I care about just as deeply as enterprise data.
